title: Speak Life
verse_text: The tongue has the power of life and death, and those who love it will eat its fruit.
insight: Your words are weapons. They carry the power of life and death.
Every word plants seeds. Speak life and harvest blessing.
one_minute_win: Say one life-giving word to someone today.
